0.1.name: wordpress/maphilight
0.1.description:
MapHilight makes it easy to integrate the javascript needed to make your maps or images interactive. Based on the imagemapster jQuery plugin, MapHilight allows you to customize a hover effect on your maps or images. Plugin uses jQuery plugin found here : https://github.com/jamietre/imagemapster Thanks jmcphail for pointing it out on this plugin's Wordpress forum.

Use it in your Posts by adding the following shortcode : [maphilight]

Learn More
